record.title: RECOGNIZING THE 50TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE NATIONAL ACADEMY OF RECORDING ARTS AND SCIENCES
record.narrative:
RECOGNIZING THE 50TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE NATIONAL ACADEMY OF RECORDING ARTS AND SCIENCES -- (Senate - February 08, 2008)

[Page: S821]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Judiciary Committee be discharged from further consideration of H. Con. Res. 273, and the Senate proceed to the measure.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The clerk will report the resolution by title.
The bill clerk read as follows:
A concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 273) recognizing the 50th anniversary of the National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the concurrent resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the concurrent resolution be agreed to, the preamble be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, that there be no intervening action or debate, and that any statements relating to this matter be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 273) was agreed to.
